```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)

options(scipen=999, digits=2)

# Number of compounds (including trace)
dat1 <- read_csv("results/ncompT_coef-summary.csv")
dat1 <- as.data.frame(t(dat1))
dat1 <- tibble::rownames_to_column(dat1, "VALUE")
names(dat1) <- dat1[1,]
dat1 <- dat1[-1,]

dat1[2:6] <- sapply(dat1[2:6], as.numeric)

dat1 <- dat1[c(1:6,10,11,7:9),]
dat1$coef <- c("Threshold0_1", "Threshold1_2", "Threshold2_3+", 
               "SexM", "Juvenile", "Subadult", "SexM x Juv", "SexM x SubAd", 
               "Pasture (30km2)", "Intermix (100m, 30km2)", "Lagged BMI (30km2)")
```


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
kab <- knitr::kable(dat1, caption="N compounds (with trace)",
                    booktabs=TRUE, label="kable table1", digits=2)

kable_classic_2(kab, full_width=F, latex_options="hold_position")
```
